title: Banana and oat chocolate brownies
ingredients: ['120g quick cooking porridge oats', '145g soft brown sugar', '80g wholemeal flour', '55g cocoa powder', '40g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 banana', '2 eggs', '115g butter', '80ml milk', '60g apple sauce', '2 tablespoons vanilla extract', '40g chocolate chips']
